00031 
00032 #ifndef MSP430DEF_H
00033 #define MSP430DEF_H
00034 
00035 #ifdef HAVE_STDINT_H
00036 #include <stdint.h>
00037 #else
00038 #ifndef uint8_t
00039 typedef unsigned char   uint8_t;
00040 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;
00041 typedef unsigned long  uint32_t;
00042 typedef   signed char    int8_t;
00043 typedef          short  int16_t;
00044 typedef          long   int32_t;
00045 #endif
00046 #endif /* !HAVE_STDINT_H */
00047 
00048 /* These names are deprecated, use C99 names. */
00049 typedef  uint8_t    u8_t;
00050 typedef uint16_t   u16_t;
00051 typedef uint32_t   u32_t;
00052 typedef  int32_t   s32_t;
00053 
00054 /* default DCOSYNCH Period is 30 seconds */
00055 #ifdef DCOSYNCH_CONF_PERIOD
00056 #define DCOSYNCH_PERIOD DCOSYNCH_CONF_PERIOD
00057 #else
00058 #define DCOSYNCH_PERIOD 30
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 void msp430_cpu_init(void);     /* Rename to cpu_init() later! */
00062 void msp430_sync_dco(void);
00063 
00064 
00065 #define cpu_init() msp430_cpu_init()
00066 
00067 void   *sbrk(int);
00068 
00069 typedef int spl_t;
00070 void    splx_(spl_t);
00071 spl_t   splhigh_(void);
00072 
00073 #define splhigh() splhigh_()
00074 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00075 #define splx(sr) sr = __get_SR_register()
00076 #else
00077 #define splx(sr) __asm__ __volatile__("bis %0, r2" : : "r" (sr))
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 /* Workaround for bug in msp430-gcc compiler */
00081 #if defined(__MSP430__) && defined(__GNUC__) && MSP430_MEMCPY_WORKAROUND
00082 #ifndef memcpy
00083 #include <string.h>
00084 
00085 void *w_memcpy(void *out, const void *in, size_t n);
00086 #define memcpy(dest, src, count) w_memcpy(dest, src, count)
00087 
00088 /* #define memcpy(dest, src, count) do {                    \ */
00089 /*   if(count == 2) {                                       \ */
00090 /*     *((uint8_t *)dest) = *((uint8_t *)src);              \ */
00091 /*     *((uint8_t *)dest + 1) = *((uint8_t *)src + 1);      \ */
00092 /*   } else {                                               \ */
00093 /*     memcpy(dest, src, count);                            \ */
00094 /*   }                                                      \ */
00095 /* } while(0) */
00096 
00097 void *w_memset(void *out, int value, size_t n);
00098 #define memset(dest, value, count) w_memset(dest, value, count)
00099 
00100 /* #define memset(dest, value, count) do {                  \ */
00101 /*   if(count == 2) {                                       \ */
00102 /*     *((uint8_t *)dest) = (uint8_t)value;                 \ */
00103 /*     *((uint8_t *)dest + 1) = (uint8_t)value;             \ */
00104 /*   } else {                                               \ */
00105 /*     memset(dest, value, count);                          \ */
00106 /*   }                                                      \ */
00107 /* } while(0) */
00108 #endif /* memcpy */
00109 #endif /* __GNUC__ &&  __MSP430__ && MSP430_MEMCPY_WORKAROUND */

00121 #define MSP430_REQUIRE_LPM1 1

00123 #define MSP430_REQUIRE_LPM3 3

00126 void msp430_remove_lpm_req(int req);
